full_text:
Fed response to S&P 500 corrections...
2010: -17%. Rates @ 0%, QE2
2011: -21%. Rates @ 0%, Operation Twist
2012: -11%. Rates @ 0%, QE3
2016: -15%. Rates @ 0.25%, stopped hiking plan
2018: -20%. Cut rates 3x in '19, QE4
2020: -35%. Cut rates to 0%, QE5
2022: -25%. Rate hikes, QT

localize.full_text:
S&P500の修正に伴うFRBの対応...
2010: -17%. 金利＠0％、QE2
2011: -21%. 金利@0%、オペレーションツイスト
2012: -11%. 金利@0%、QE3
2016: -15%. 金利＠0.25％、ハイクアップ計画停止
2018: -20%. 19年に3倍の利下げ、QE4
2020: -35%. 0%まで金利を引き下げ、QE5を実施
2022: -25%. 利上げ、QT
